revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=14:48, 29 April 2011 |action1link=Talk:Mercury dime/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=426547386 |action2=FAC |action2date=20:13, 19 June 2011 |action2link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Mercury dime/archive1 |action2result=promoted |action2oldid=434847487 |dykdate=30 April 2011 |dykentry=... that it is widely believed that Elsie Stevens, wife of poet [[Wallace Stevens]], was the model for the '''[[Mercury dime]]''' ''(pictured)''? |topic=Economics and business |currentstatus=FA |four=yes |maindate=October 17, 2012 }} {{WPBS|1= {{WikiProject Numismatics|class=FA|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject United States|class=FA|importance=low}} }} {{Talk:Mercury dime/GA1}} == Introductory section == {{Resolved}} Something seems amiss with the introductory paragraph here. It looks as if an entire preceding section might be missing. [[User:PurpleChez|PurpleChez]] ([[User talk:PurpleChez|talk]]) 14:45, 17 October 2012 (UTC) :Whatever it was seems to have been fixed...or maybe there was a glitch at my end.[[User:PurpleChez|PurpleChez]] ([[User talk:PurpleChez|talk]]) 14:46, 17 October 2012 (UTC) ::The article on the Main Page is ever the subject of vandalism. Perhaps that was it.--[[User:Wehwalt|Wehwalt]] ([[User talk:Wehwalt|talk]]) 15:36, 17 October 2012 (UTC) == Now a FA in Chinese Wikipedia == I have translated this article to [[Chinese Wikipedia]] [[:zh:墨丘利10美分硬币|here]] and promoted to FA status, and I want to thank [[User:Wehwalt]] for his effort to write this amazing article. --[[User:Jarodalien|Jarodalien]] ([[User talk:Jarodalien|talk]]) 08:18, 11 January 2016 (UTC) :{{Like}} ---[[User:Another Believer|Another Believer]] ([[User talk:Another Believer|Talk]]) 14:26, 27 October 2016 (UTC)
